attributes.action: scrap the planned non transferable vehicle tax
attributes.additional_details: As of the 1 Octobre 2014, the DVLA plan to get rid of the traditional vehicle paper tax disc so that the whole system can be digitalised. Also at this time, they are going to make the vehicle tax on the vehicle at that time invaild once it has been sold to a new owner! This means you could buy a second hand car with 11 months tax, then find youself retaxing it just to drive it home.
